title: LF 5's Team PLAT NEED ADC, SUP AND JG
body:
Want to create a casual team of 5's for rank progression.

Schedule save at least 2 days each week for flex 5's. Time will be determined upon asking everyone's optimal schedule. (we can play more if people are keen)

Requirements

Looking for ADC, SUP AND JG At Platinum ranking minimum.

1. Mature Over 18 + only.
2. Need to be willing to use voice Communication Skype/ Discord etc.
3. No Toxic Frdly Players only.

Just add me on game and lets get rolling!

 ingame name = Mur1m

replies.body: *bump* We still need ADC! please post here or inv me in game! remember you need to have an actual flex ranking to play. as in you need to have done placements to at least gold in flex ranked. some people were diamonds but haven't done their actual placements :P

Well let me give some advice. You can't expect to join a team after calling my idea stupid lol.... (you have failed the third requirement and possibly the first)

Secondly my requirement is that you have a platinum ranking either in solo rank or team rank. However, this is not a hard requirement and I was readily accepting a gold rank player yesterday because he was polite and motivated.
